text: The United States Senate Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Energy is one of four subcommittees of the U.S. Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee. Some of the things they deal with include nuclear, coal and synthetic fuels research and development; nuclear and non-nuclear energy projects and oil/gas pipelines. ==Current members== Majority Minority * Joe Manchin, West Virginia, Chairman * Ron Wyden, Oregon * Maria Cantwell, Washington * Bernie Sanders, VermontSens. Sanders and King are Independents, but caucus with Democrats on the committee. * Martin Heinrich, New Mexico * Mazie Hirono, Hawaii *Angus King, Maine * Catherine Cortez Masto, Nevada * Mark Kelly, Arizona * John Hickenlooper, Colorado * John Barrasso, Wyoming, Ranking Member * Jim Risch, Idaho * Mike Lee, Utah * Steve Daines, Montana * Lisa Murkowski, Alaska * John Hoeven, North Dakota * James Lankford, Oklahoma * Bill Cassidy, Louisiana * Cindy Hyde-Smith, Mississippi * Roger Marshall, Kansas Ex officio Ex officio ==References== ==Other websites== * U.S. Senate Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Energy, official web site Energy Senate Energy
title: United States Senate Energy Subcommittee on Energy
